<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="channel=automateallthethings&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&videoId=c5626067&device_id=01b1d7de6c432ba6"></object><br/><strong>AutomateAllTheThings</strong> built a Kerbal EFT-1 and tried to launch it simultaneously with the launch of Orion. We mean tried. Can he stave off the sandman and make his launch happen? Find out here.</p>
Lol, I love his laughter as the single booster flies off to the side.
